name: Rad-Town
description:
Your score increases with enemy kills. There is a boss at the end of the game,  beat it, and you win.
A CONTROLLER IS RECOMMENDED

Controls:

  • Attack:
    X
    F
    Left Click
    • (Controller)
      Right Bumper
      X
  • Dodge:
    S
    Down Arrow
    Left Shift
    Right Click
    Z
    • (Controller)
      Left Bumper
  • Jump:
    W
    Space
    Up Arrow
    • (Controller)
      A
  • Switch Weapon:
    • Tab
      • (Controller)
      • Y
